name: Repair frenzy
description:
Game was made for GGameJam 2020:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/repair-frenzy-5

Video Link: 
https://youtu.be/RZwdomN8z98

Description:
You're a goblin that is defending the dungeon. Collect resources. Repair the traps. Don't let the Knight steal your gold. This is a top-down tower-defense dungeon repairing system.

Controls:
WASD - walk
Space - action (break/repair traps)
